item.description:
Sandra has recommended this hike. There are numerous different trails, so if anyone has any preference please let us know when we meet.

As always this meet is open to anyone so please feel free to bring friends and their Pups!!

It is located on Rt85 by the intersection of Daly Rd.
Coordinates:
41.72611,-72.44056 (Gay City State Park)
Link for directions (I hope this will help some people not get lost!! )
http://maps.google.co...


Directions per the DEP website:
From the South/New London area: Follow Route 85 north. Park entrance is 6.7 miles past the intersection with Route 66.

From Glastonbury area: Take Route 85. Park entrance is 2.0 miles past the intersection with Route 94.

From the North/Hartford & Massachusetts area: I-384 east to Exit 5. Take Route 85 south for 4.7 miles.


Trail Map:
http://www.ct.gov/dep...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the parking lot with a Blue Ford Edge
item.name: Gay City State Park
